name: Sinch Brazil
description:
Sinch is a company specialist in Customer Experience solutions. It has 06 different solutions that help companies to strengthen the relationship with their customers. Within its portfolio, it has an omnichannel customer service platform and messaging solutions that use various channels such as SMS, WhatsApp, RCS, ChatBots, Email, Voice, among others.

Since the beginning of its operation, WAVY now Sinch Latam has impacted more than 200 million users and 400 partner companies. Its customers, in addition to more than 40 mobile operators, include Disney, Microsoft, Google, Facebook, WhatsApp, Natura, SBT, Bradesco and Amazon. It is among the 100 Startups to Watch 2019, ranked by the magazines “Small Companies & Big Business”, “Época Negócios”, by Editora Globo, and consulting firms Corp.vc and EloGroup.
